Class TurnManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP33.controller.rules.tools.AbstractManager
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP33.controller.rules.TurnManager
public class TurnManager
extends AbstractManager
Class that manage everything related to how execute a player turn
